languages.text: "Я многажды молилась, чтобы это случилось. Но в этом проклятом месте Его нет".
"I prayed many times for that to happen, but He is nowhere to be found in this cursed place."
languages.original_text: "Я многажды молилась, чтобы это случилось. Но в этом проклятом месте Его нет".

traits.locale_text: "I prayed many times for that to happen, but He is nowhere to be found in this cursed place."

"I prayed many times for that to happen, but He is nowhere to be found in this cursed place."
"I prayed many times for that to happen, but He is nowhere to be found in this cursed place."

languages.text: "Ich habe oft darum gebetet, dass das geschehen möge, doch er ist an diesem verfluchten Ort nirgendwo zu finden."
languages.original_text: "I prayed many times for that to happen, but He is nowhere to be found in this cursed place."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe oft darum gebetet, dass das geschehen möge, doch er ist an diesem verfluchten Ort nirgendwo zu finden."

languages.text: « J'ai longtemps prié pour que cela arrive, mais Il est inaccessible, dans cet antre de perdition. »
languages.original_text: "I prayed many times for that to happen, but He is nowhere to be found in this cursed place."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai longtemps prié pour que cela arrive, mais Il est inaccessible, dans cet antre de perdition. »

languages.text: «Recé muchas veces para que sucediera, mas Él no está presente en este lugar maldito».
languages.original_text: "I prayed many times for that to happen, but He is nowhere to be found in this cursed place."

traits.locale_text: «Recé muchas veces para que sucediera, mas Él no está presente en este lugar maldito».

languages.text: 「私は何度も祈った。でも、彼はこの呪われた城の何処にもいない」
languages.original_text: "I prayed many times for that to happen, but He is nowhere to be found in this cursed place."

traits.locale_text: 「私は何度も祈った。でも、彼はこの呪われた城の何処にもいない」

languages.text: “我祈祷了那么多次，但在这个被诅咒的地方，祂根本无处可寻。”
languages.original_text: "I prayed many times for that to happen, but He is nowhere to be found in this cursed place."

traits.locale_text: “我祈祷了那么多次，但在这个被诅咒的地方，祂根本无处可寻。”

languages.original_text: "I prayed many times for that to happen, but He is nowhere to be found in this cursed place."

languages.text: "Bunun gerçekleşmesi için nice dualar ettim. Ancak bu lanetli yerde O'nu bulmak mümkün değil."
languages.original_text: "I prayed many times for that to happen, but He is nowhere to be found in this cursed place."
